members.name: ariaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Alternative status label for screen reader

members.name: ariaLive
members.descriptionHtml: Politeness setting for label update announcement.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Additional CSS class(es) to apply to the Spinner.

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Optional callback to access the ISpinner interface. Use this instead of ref for accessing the public methods and properties of the component.

members.name: label
members.descriptionHtml: The label to show next to the Spinner. Label updates will be announced to the screen readers. Use ariaLive to control politeness level.

members.name: labelPosition
members.descriptionHtml: The position of the label in regards of the spinner animation.

members.name: size
members.descriptionHtml: The size of Spinner to render. \{ extraSmall, small, medium, large \}

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Call to provide customized styling that will layer on top of the variant rules.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme (provided through customization.)

members.name: type
members.descriptionHtml: Deprecated and will be removed at \>= 2.0.0. Use `SpinnerSize` instead.

tables.name: ISpinnerStyleProps
tables.descriptionHtml: The props needed to construct styles. This represents the simplified set of immutable things which control the class names.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: CSS class name for the component attached to the root stylable area.

members.name: labelPosition
members.descriptionHtml: Position of the label in regards to the spinner animation.

members.name: size
members.descriptionHtml: Size of the spinner animation.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by High-Order Component.

tables.name: ISpinnerStyles
tables.descriptionHtml: Represents the stylable areas of the control.

members.name: circle
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the spinner circle animation.

members.name: label
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the label accompanying the circle.

members.name: root
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the root element. Refers to the wrapper containing both the circle and the label.

members.name: screenReaderText
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the hidden helper element to aid with screen readers.

tables.name: SpinnerSize
tables.descriptionHtml: Possible variations of the spinner circle size.

members.name: large
members.descriptionHtml: 28px Spinner diameter

members.name: medium
members.descriptionHtml: 20px Spinner diameter

members.name: small
members.descriptionHtml: 16px Spinner diameter

members.name: xSmall
members.descriptionHtml: 12px Spinner diameter

members.name: large
members.descriptionHtml: Deprecated and will be removed at \>= 2.0.0. Use `SpinnerSize.large` instead.

members.name: normal
members.descriptionHtml: Deprecated and will be removed at \>= 2.0.0. Use `SpinnerSize.medium` instead.
